name: T-01
description: Description: The T-01 is inspired by luxury through simplicity. Rep. the brand in a way only those chosen few will notice. T-01 is for those who know that real luxury and quality speak for itself.
material: Material: Made from 100% combed and ring-spun long staple cotton for a devilishly soft feel. Accented with CPSIA certified vinyl for a durable and quality finish.

name: T-02
description: Description: Aggressive design combined with a strong impression. The T-02 is unapologetic and uncaring. It’s aggressive full back design Hannya mask coupled with bold kanji create a bold statement. For those who know who they are and what they want.
material: Material: Made from 100% combed and ring-spun long staple cotton for a devilishly soft feel. Accented with CPSIA certified vinyl for a durable and quality finish.

name: MON
description:
Description: The Mon (or Kamon) series is all about you. Our “investor series,” each hoodie is a custom made 1 of 1 product that uses your Japanese family crest alongside our brand. Each design is pre-generated with an open dialogue. Here are the steps.

    1. Send us an email with
        *Your Family Crest
        *3 Letters of your choice (Can Be Initials)
        *Color combination (See Chart Below)
    2. We’ll send you a digital design
    3. Give us your confirmation and we’ll send you a Paypal checkout link!
    4. Receive your jacket in 2 weeks (it is custom made)
material: Material: 52% combed and ring-spun long staple cotton combined with 48% poly fleece for an extra soft feel, and finished with a high quality CPSIA certified vinyl application.
